> ?gsub

gsub() 사용법
> gsub('[^0-9]', '', 'p.R102X')

> gsub('[^A-Z]', '', 'p.R102X')

> gsub('[0-9]', '', 'p.R102X')
[1] "p.RX"
> gsub('[A-Z]', '', 'p.R102X')
[1] "p.102"

for (row in d$p.Protein){
  d <- mutate(d, n.protein = as.numeric(gsub('[^0-9]', '', d$p.Protein)))
}


for (i in 1:263){
  a <- as.numeric(gsub('[^0-9]','',d[i,'p.Protein']))
  d[i,'col'] <- a
}

a <- c(d$p.Protein)
a <- as.numeric(gsub('[^0-9]','',a))
summary(a)
